name: Pink Floyd
summary:
Pink Floyd. Soundtrack: The Big Boss. Syd Barrett: vocals, guitar (born: Roger Keith Barrett; 6 January, 1946; Cambridge, Cambridgeshire, England, UK). In 1968, Syd Barrett left the band. Syd died in July, 2006 at aged 60 from pancreatic cancer.

David Gilmour: vocals, guitar (born: David John Gilmour; 6 March, 1946; Cambridge, Cambridgeshire, England, UK). In 1968, Gilmour replaced Syd Barrett.

Roger Waters: vocals, bass guitar (born: George Roger Waters; 6 September, 1943;...
